DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Study Subjects With Severe Hemophilia A Comparing Pharmacokinetic Parameters BAY81-8973 Advate
DOC.criteria: Males , age 18 65 year Subjects Severe hemophilia A documented plasma FVIII level < 1 % â‰¥ 150 exposure day FVIII concentrate ( ) support medical record Evidence current past inhibitor antibody History congenital acquire coagulation disorder hemophilia A Platelet count < 75,000/mm3 Abnormal renal function ( serum creatinine > 2 time upper limit normal [ ULN ] range ) Active liver disease verify medical history persistently elevate alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > 5 time ULN severe liver disease evidence , limit following : International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) > 1.4 , hypoalbuminemia , portal vein hypertension include presence otherwise unexplained splenomegaly history esophageal varix .
